commands: if command -v pip3.9; then pip3.9 install redis; else echo 'pip3.9 not found'; fi
if command -v pip3; then pip3 install redis; else echo 'pip3 not found'; fi
if command -v pip3.9; then pip3.9 install jsonschema; else echo 'pip3.9 not found'; fi
if command -v pip3; then pip3 install jsonschema; else echo 'pip3 not found'; fi
